newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to list options on eight stocks.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to list options on eight stocks.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) said on Wednesday it would list options on IMNET Systems Inc on September 30.
The exchange also said it would list options on shares of Western Resources Inc on October 1.
In addition, it said it would list options on Comshare Inc, Cylink Corp, Forte Software Inc, Millennium Chemicals Inc, Vans Inc and YES! Entertainment Corp on October 2.
IMNET options will have expirations of October, November, February and May, with opening strikes of 20, 22-1/2 and 25.
Option Funding Group will be the DPM.
Western Resources will have initial expirations of October, November, February and May. Opening strikes will be 25, 30 and 35. The options will trade in the Johnson & Johnson crowd.
Comshare, Cylink and YES! options will all have initial expirations of October, November, February and May.
Opening strikes on Comshare and Cylink will be 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2. They will be 10, 12-1/2 and 15 for YES!.
Comshare options will trade in the Bristol-Myers Squibb crowd and Cylink options will trade in the Texas Instruments crowd. Group One will be the DPM for YES! options.
The Forte Software and Vans options will have initial expirations of October, November, January and April.
Forte will have opening strikes of 30, 35 and 40 and Mercury trading will be the DPM.
Opening strikes on Vans will be 15, 17-1/2 and 20. Eclipse LLC will be the DPM.
For Millennium Chemicals, initial expirations will be October, November, December and March, with opening strike prices to be set October 1. The company is a spin-off of U.K.-based Hanson Plc.
Millennium options will trade in the Viacom crowd.
